featured.text: Almost everything, from food to machinery, comes by way of the sea in huge ships piloted by captains.
This captain is called a marine pilot.
But the captain of a ship is responsible for guiding the vessel until they hit a port, waiting to enter the harbor.
The task of bringing the ship into the harbor and anchoring it is taken up by a different captain.

For example, Superman always arrives in the nick of time to prevent a disaster from happening, Peter Pan can fly at will to tease the bad guy Captain Hook, and Harry Potter has his magic power to take revenge on his uncle, aunt and cousin, who always ill-treat him. 44.

definition.en_def: The person in command of a ship or an aircraft; a leader or officer in charge.
definition.example: The captain gave orders to the crew before setting sail.
